meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>fee</kanji> for <kanji>enter</kanji>ing a <kanji>public building</kanji> is the <vocabulary>admission fee</vocabulary>. Gotta pay it if you want to get inside.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
